participant_1.background:
I am trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life.
i dye my hair blonde.
I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
I'm not rich, but I do take care of my health.

participant_2.background:
I'm not that concerned with looking my best.
i like to play outside.
I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
I run every day because I want to be healthy and set a good example for my younger sibling.

content.text: Hello there! How are you today?
I'm doing well! Thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great! I'm just relaxing at home, watching some funny shows.
That sounds like a nice way to spend your day. I'm just getting ready to go for a run.
Oh, that's great! I used to run all the time, but I haven't been able to lately.
Why not?
Well, I'm trying to quit smoking, and running is really hard when you're out of shape.
Oh, I see. Well, good luck! I'm sure you can do it.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm an actor, but I'm currently on a break from work.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of acting do you do?
I mostly do theater, but I've also done some film and TV.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be an actor.
You should go for it! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks! I might just do that.
You should! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
I appreciate the encouragement!
No problem! Have a great day!
You too
